import React from "react"; import { Table, TableBody, TableCaption, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow, } from "@/components/ui/table"; import { ChevronDown } from "lucide-react"; const emergencyData = [ { unit: "B-10", resident: "Simon Njau" }, { unit: "B-10", resident: "Simon Njau" }, { unit: "B-10", resident: "Simon Njau" }, { unit: "B-10", resident: "Simon Njau" }, { unit: "B-10", resident: "Simon Njau" }, ]; export function EmergencyTable() { return (
{/* Header */}

EMERGENCY:{" "} Panic button triggered at Unit 7 - Floor 2

{/* Table */} Emergency check-ins Unit Resident {emergencyData.map((entry, index) => ( {entry.unit} {entry.resident} ))}
); } export default EmergencyTable;
